Html:
Hi Radioman,

is GMaps suitable for WPF & MVVM?

In the code behing (xaml.cs), which lies in a class library project, I put all the code from the Demo.MainWindow.xaml.cs - and also added the other classes from the demo.
In my xaml preview designer, I see the whole designed window but when I start the application nothing is shown at all - empty screen.

Any ideas?

Thanks a lot in advance
nop, works for me without any mmmvvvmmm ;}
ok, thanks for the quick reply. But have you ever tried it with mvvm? Or do you know somebody that has made it work?
it depends on what do you want to do, you can always change small stuff if something doesn't fit correctly
